feed.title: UltimateHomeServer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for UltimateHomeServer: Initial Beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: move names to top of port by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/1
  • feat: configurable ports by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/2
  • docs: categorize services by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/3
  • feat: add prowlarr by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/4
  • refactor: template nginx ports by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/5
  • refactor: conditionals in nginx by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/6
  • feat: improved automation scripts by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/7
  • docs: ultimate home server docs by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/8
  • chore: contributor prep by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/9
  • ci: add commitlint by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/10
  • docs: add badges by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/11
  • chore: add license by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/12
  • chore: update bsky url by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/13
  • docs: fix clone string by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/14
  • chore: prowlarr config by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/19
  • feat!: remove jackett by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/20
  • chore: Group current & expected behavior by @ryanwohara in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/18
  • Prep for new CLI by @KyleTryon in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/21

New Contributors

  • @KyleTryon made their first contribution in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/1
  • @ryanwohara made their first contribution in https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/pull/18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TechSquidTV/UltimateHomeServer/commits/v0.0.1
